statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={170.8}{e}^{{{0.0211}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0211}}\approx{1.021324178949}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.021324178949}-{1}={0.021324178948973}\approx{0.0213} and the percent is 2.13.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
